title: New: NIXE – Rib Cage
body:
Great debut single from NIXE aka the North East’s Carmen Green, showcasing some sweetly refined pop songwriting on Rib Cage.

 Definitely a touch of Sylvan Esso, Imogen Heap or even Chairlift here, and undoubtedly one of my favourite debuts of the year thus far.
